items.title: The Bright Future of Web 3.0?
items.summary:
Looking forward

We dive into the evolution of the web that claims to put the power of platforms back into the hands of the people. But is it really fulfilling its promise?
items.content_html:
Looking forward

We dive into the evolution of the web that claims to put the power of platforms back into the hands of the people. But is it really fulfilling its promise?

items.title: Campaigns
items.summary: Reading and writing about technology is a great way to create a more engaged community in tech, to learn and…
items.content_html:
Reading and writing about technology is a great way to create a more engaged community in tech, to learn and nurture ideas about art, the internet, coding, technology and creativity in general.

Â 

Schooling in Design

School is a great place to begin the conversation. Learn more about how you can help spread exciting creative projects in your school.
